Journal Story: Hiked with DB and Jaepaer as Jaepaer starts his thru hike. Late start but a nice hike and Jaepaer is off to a fast start!

long day but no rain!!  That was a shocker based on forecast a day ago. We all had a long day but Jaepaer  is officially on the AT !!  Got to camp early and relaxed. Stormed all night at 3 forks but we all stayed dry.

stealth Camped near the Shelter. Place was packed and no room for late arrivals. Great day but long. No rain and had to bushwhack to a stealth camping site a few hundred yards from the Shelter. We all are feeling the effects of the accumulated miles. Cold night coming.

last day with Jaepaer on the trail for a while. I will probably hike with him again when he gets to north of Pearisburg VA which is where I stopped my last section hike. I have completed the trail from springer to North of Pearisburg. And now I have completed the approach trail from Amicalola Falls State Park.  Jaepaer was ready for a short day and stayed at Woody Gap at the hostel in the top of the grocery store in Suches GA.   It was a short but tough hike today. Very windy and cold. Wind chill in 20’s. Was glad to get to the store and have a pizza and warm place to relax. Met nice young couple who were thru hiking. DB and I gave them some food and a near full fuel canister.   Good finish and now Jaepaer will be off and running at full speed in the morning.
